metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28284 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-28284` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-geckodriver - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2').
